flawed_nl_solution:
Carl saved in 6 weeks $25/week x 6 weeks = $<<25*6=150>>150
On the seventh week, he ended up having to pay in bills $150/3 = $<<150/3=50>>50
His savings were then $150 - $50 = $<<150-50=98>>98
His dad gave him $170 - $98 = $<<170-98=72>>72
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 98. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
